summary.span: Provides control capability to validate whether the value of the associated input control is different from its initial value.

span.span: Provides control capability to validate whether the value of the associated input control is different from its initial value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类行为相同，对 ASP.NET控件。This class behaves identically to the ASP.NET control. 默认情况下，窗体上的控件引发窗体以在窗体提交到服务器时执行验证的验证程序控件。By default, controls on a form raise validator controls on the form to perform validation when the form is submitted to the server. 若要禁用自动验证，设置属性到`false`。To disable automatic validation, set the property on the to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例要求用户输入一个介于 1 到 23 之间。The following code example requires a user to enter a number from 1 to 23. 它使用这两个和验证用户输入。It uses both the and the to validate user entries. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileRegExprValidatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileRegExprValidatorSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileRegExprValidatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileRegExprValidatorSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

The base value for the validator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在验证期间，验证程序比较提交的值的值与属性。During validation, the validator compares a submitted value to the value of the property. 如果值相同，验证程序将假定为必填字段的值在未填写和报告验证错误。If the values are the same, the validator assumes that the value for the required field has not been filled in and reports a validation error.
